tasks.title: Initialize Next.js project with TypeScript and App Router
tasks.description: Run create-next-app with TypeScript, ESLint, Tailwind CSS, App Router. Configure tsconfig strict mode.

tasks.title: Install and configure Tailwind CSS v4
tasks.description: Install Tailwind CSS, configure for src/ directory, set up global styles with river/aquatic color palette.

tasks.title: Install PixiJS v8 and verify WebGL rendering
tasks.description: Install pixi.js v8. Create a minimal test: mount a PixiJS Application to a canvas element and render a colored rectangle to confirm WebGL works.

tasks.title: Install Solana wallet adapter packages
tasks.description: Install @solana/web3.js, @solana/wallet-adapter-base, @solana/wallet-adapter-react, @solana/wallet-adapter-phantom, tweetnacl.

tasks.title: Install database and cache dependencies
tasks.description: Install drizzle-orm, drizzle-kit, @neondatabase/serverless, @upstash/redis, jose.

tasks.title: Install utility dependencies
tasks.description: Install zustand, swr, bad-words.

tasks.title: Set up project directory structure
tasks.description: Create the folder hierarchy: src/app, src/components/canvas, src/components/overlay, src/lib/solana, src/lib/db, src/lib/trout, src/hooks, src/workers, src/types, public/assets/sprites, public/assets/background, public/assets/ui, scripts.

tasks.title: Create .env.example with all required variables
tasks.description: Create .env.example with SOLANA_RPC_URL, TOKEN_MINT_ADDRESS, HELIUS_API_KEY, DATABASE_URL, REDIS_URL, NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL, CRON_SECRET, JWT_SECRET.

tasks.title: Create TypeScript type definitions
tasks.description: Define core types in src/types/index.ts: TroutData, TroutTier, TroutSimState, CameraState, AABB, VisibleTrout, DeviceCapabilities, TierThresholds, and all API request/response types.

tasks.title: Set up Zustand store
tasks.description: Create the main Zustand store with TroutStore interface: troutMap, camera state, UI state (selectedTrout, hoveredTrout, searchQuery), wallet state, and quality setting.

tasks.title: Define Drizzle ORM schema for holders table
tasks.description: Create src/lib/db/schema.ts with holders table: address (VARCHAR 44 PK), balance (BIGINT), first_seen (TIMESTAMP), last_updated (TIMESTAMP). Add indexes on balance and first_seen.

tasks.title: Define Drizzle ORM schema for custom_names table
tasks.description: Add custom_names table to schema: address (FK to holders), display_name (VARCHAR 20 UNIQUE), verified_at, updated_at. Add case-insensitive unique index on display_name.

tasks.title: Set up PostgreSQL client (Neon serverless driver)
tasks.description: Create src/lib/db/postgres.ts with Neon serverless connection using DATABASE_URL. Export a drizzle instance configured with the schema.

tasks.title: Set up Redis client (Upstash)
tasks.description: Create src/lib/db/redis.ts with Upstash Redis REST client using REDIS_URL. Export singleton instance.

tasks.title: Generate and run initial database migration
tasks.description: Configure drizzle.config.ts, run drizzle-kit generate to create migration SQL, verify migration files are correct.

tasks.title: Implement Redis cache population function
tasks.description: Create function populateCache() in src/lib/db/redis.ts that takes holder rows + name rows, computes scores/tiers/ranks, builds Redis pipeline to populate trout:all sorted set and trout:data:{address} hashes with 12-min TTL.

tasks.title: Implement trout score formula: sqrt(tokens) x sqrt(days)
tasks.description: Create src/lib/trout/sizing.ts with computeTroutScore(tokensHeld, daysHeld). Handle token decimal adjustment. Return raw score number.

tasks.title: Implement percentile-based tier assignment
tasks.description: Add computeThresholds() and assignTier() to sizing.ts. Thresholds at p20/p50/p80/p95/p99 map to tiers 1-6. Add computeVisualScale() for within-tier variation.

tasks.title: Implement name validation and profanity filter
tasks.description: Create src/lib/trout/naming.ts with validateDisplayName(). Enforce: 1-20 chars, /^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\.]+$/, profanity filter via bad-words library. Export isNameAvailable() for uniqueness checks.

tasks.title: Implement deterministic position seeding from wallet address
tasks.description: Add seedFromAddress() and computeStablePosition() to sizing.ts or a new positions.ts. Hash wallet address to deterministic x,y within world bounds. Use LCG for second coordinate.

tasks.title: Implement Helius DAS API holder fetching
tasks.description: Create src/lib/solana/holders.ts with fetchAllHolders(). Paginate through getTokenAccounts, aggregate by owner wallet. Return Map<address, balance>.

tasks.title: Implement cron sync endpoint
tasks.description: Create src/app/api/cron/sync-holders/route.ts. Protected by CRON_SECRET. Acquires Redis lock, fetches holders from Helius, diffs against PostgreSQL, applies inserts/updates/deletes in batches, repopulates Redis cache, releases lock.

tasks.title: Configure Vercel cron schedule in vercel.json
tasks.description: Create/update vercel.json with crons config pointing to /api/cron/sync-holders every 10 minutes. Add Cache-Control headers for /api/trouts and /api/stats.

tasks.title: Implement Solana RPC client for verification
tasks.description: Create src/lib/solana/client.ts with connection to SOLANA_RPC_URL. Minimal client â€” only used for individual wallet lookups during verification.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/trouts endpoint
tasks.description: Create Edge Runtime route. Supports ?bbox= for viewport queries and ?limit=&cursor= for pagination. Reads from Redis. Returns trout array with address, displayName, balance, daysHeld, score, tier, rank, x, y. Cache-Control: s-maxage=60.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/trouts/[address] endpoint
tasks.description: Create Edge Runtime dynamic route. Fetch single trout from Redis hash. Return 404 if not found.

tasks.title: Implement POST /api/verify endpoint
tasks.description: Serverless Node.js route. Accepts { address, message, signature }. Verifies Ed25519 signature via tweetnacl. Checks timestamp within 5 min. Confirms address is in holders table. Issues JWT (24h, HS256) with address as subject.

tasks.title: Implement POST /api/name endpoint
tasks.description: Serverless route. Requires Bearer JWT. Validates name (regex, length, profanity). Checks uniqueness in Redis then PostgreSQL. Upserts custom_names row. Invalidates Redis cache for address. Returns updated name.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/stats endpoint
tasks.description: Edge Runtime route. Returns totalHolders, totalSupplyHeld, avgDaysHeld, largestTrout, oldestTrout, lastUpdated. Read from Redis trout:stats key. Cache-Control: s-maxage=120.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/leaderboard endpoint
tasks.description: Edge Runtime route. Supports ?page=&limit=&search= params. Uses Redis sorted set ZREVRANGE for pagination. Search falls back to PostgreSQL ILIKE query. Returns ranked entries array + pagination metadata.

tasks.title: Create main PixiJS application component (TroutScene)
tasks.description: Create src/components/canvas/TroutScene.tsx. Initialize PIXI.Application with fullscreen, no antialias (pixel art), high-performance GPU preference. Mount canvas as page background. Handle resize events.

tasks.title: Set up display layer hierarchy
tasks.description: In TroutScene, create ordered containers: backgroundLayer (z=0), troutLayer (z=1) with smallTroutBatch (ParticleContainer) and largeTroutGroup (Container), effectsLayer (z=2), labelLayer (z=3).

tasks.title: Create placeholder pixel-art sprite sheet
tasks.description: Create scripts/generate-placeholders.ts that generates a simple sprite sheet with colored rectangles for each of the 6 tiers. Output to public/assets/sprites/trout-atlas.png + trout-atlas.json.

tasks.title: Implement SpatialGrid class for viewport culling
tasks.description: Create src/components/canvas/SpatialGrid.ts. Uniform grid with CELL_SIZE=200. Methods: update(address, x, y), query(AABB) -> string[], remove(address). Use Map<number, Set<string>> for cells.

tasks.title: Implement ObjectPool (SpritePool) class
tasks.description: Create src/components/canvas/ObjectPool.ts. Methods: acquire(address, tier), release(address), prewarm(count). Manages PIXI.AnimatedSprite instances. Grows on demand (50 at a time), shrinks if >2x active for 30s.

tasks.title: Implement Camera class with pan/zoom
tasks.description: Create src/components/canvas/Camera.ts. Properties: x, y, zoom, targets with lerp smoothing. Zoom range 0.05-4.0, default 0.3. Implement zoomToward(worldX, worldY, delta). Apply via stage.scale and stage.position.

tasks.title: Implement camera input handlers (mouse + touch)
tasks.description: Wire up mouse drag (pan), scroll wheel (zoom toward cursor), touch drag (pan), pinch (zoom), double-click/tap (zoom 2x). Bind to PixiJS canvas events or DOM events on the canvas element.

tasks.title: Create river background with tiling sprites
tasks.description: Create placeholder background textures. Set up TilingSprite layers in backgroundLayer: far water (parallax 0.3x), mid water (parallax 0.6x), rock/plant decorations. Tile with camera movement.

tasks.title: Implement LOD rendering modes
tasks.description: Implement level-of-detail based on zoom: far zoom (<0.3x) shows colored dots, medium (0.3-1x) shows static sprites, close (>1x) shows animated sprites with labels. Adapt thresholds per quality preset.

tasks.title: Implement main render loop with frame reconciliation
tasks.description: Create the rAF loop in TroutScene: get visible bounds from camera, receive VISIBLE_TROUTS from worker, reconcile sprites (acquire new, release exited), update positions/scales/animations, apply camera transform.

tasks.title: Implement trout movement logic
tasks.description: Create src/lib/trout/movement.ts with updatePosition(), pickNextWaypoint(). Speed by tier (fry=60-100px/s to leviathan=8-15px/s). Smooth waypoint interpolation. Y-position bias by tier (small fish top, big fish deeper).

tasks.title: Create Web Worker with message protocol
tasks.description: Create src/workers/trout-simulation.worker.ts. Handle messages: INIT, LOAD_TROUTS, UPDATE_TROUT, REMOVE_TROUT, SET_VIEWPORT, TICK. Respond with VISIBLE_TROUTS (Float32Array transfer) and STATS. Run spatial grid + movement simulation.

tasks.title: Implement main-thread worker bridge
tasks.description: Create a hook or utility that spawns the Web Worker, manages postMessage communication, handles VISIBLE_TROUTS responses, and provides a fallback simulation on main thread if Workers unavailable.

tasks.title: Implement world size auto-scaling
tasks.description: Add computeWorldSize(holderCount) that scales virtual world based on holder count. Target ~1600px2 per trout. Aspect ratio 5:3. Min 4000x2400. Send world dimensions to worker on INIT.

tasks.title: Create main page layout with canvas + overlay
tasks.description: Create src/app/page.tsx as a client component. Mount TroutScene as fullscreen background. Create overlay container with pointer-events:none, individual interactive elements with pointer-events:auto.

tasks.title: Create app layout with providers
tasks.description: Create src/app/layout.tsx with Solana wallet adapter provider, Zustand provider (if needed), global styles, metadata (title, description, OG tags).

tasks.title: Implement TroutTooltip overlay component
tasks.description: Create src/components/overlay/TroutTooltip.tsx. Shows on hover/click: name, full address (copyable), tokens held, days held, rank. Positioned near the hovered trout (screen coords from PixiJS). Includes 'Follow' button.

tasks.title: Implement SearchBar overlay component
tasks.description: Create src/components/overlay/SearchBar.tsx. Floating search input. On submit: find trout by address or custom name via /api/trouts/[address]. Pan camera to trout and highlight it. Autocomplete for names.

tasks.title: Implement WalletConnect (Find My Trout) component
tasks.description: Create src/components/overlay/WalletConnect.tsx. 'Find My Trout' button. Connects Phantom, constructs sign message with timestamp+nonce, requests signature, calls POST /api/verify, stores JWT, shows rename UI on success.

tasks.title: Implement StatsBar overlay component
tasks.description: Create src/components/overlay/StatsBar.tsx. Bottom bar showing total trout count, fetched from /api/stats via SWR. Format: '12,400 trouts swimming'. Semi-transparent background.

tasks.title: Implement zoom controls (+ / - buttons)
tasks.description: Add zoom in/out buttons to the overlay. Wire to Camera.zoomToward with center-of-screen target. Make buttons large touch targets for mobile.

tasks.title: Implement useTroutData hook for client data loading
tasks.description: Create src/hooks/useTroutData.ts. Fetches /api/trouts in 1000-item pages. Streams batches to Web Worker. SWR for refresh. Handles loading states. Sends data to Zustand store.

tasks.title: Implement device capability detection and quality presets
tasks.description: Create src/hooks/useDeviceCapability.ts. Detect cores, memory, isMobile, pixelRatio. Map to low/medium/high quality preset. Store in Zustand. Apply preset to rendering limits.

tasks.title: Wire up trout click/hover interaction to tooltip
tasks.description: Detect trout sprite clicks/hovers in PixiJS. Convert world coords to screen coords. Show TroutTooltip at correct position. Set hoveredTrout in Zustand store.

tasks.title: Implement follow camera mode
tasks.description: When user clicks 'Follow' on tooltip, set selectedTrout in Zustand. Camera smoothly tracks the trout's position each frame. Zoom in to 1.5x minimum. Stop on Escape key or click elsewhere.

tasks.title: Implement search-to-camera navigation
tasks.description: When SearchBar finds a trout, animate camera to its position. Highlight the trout sprite (pulsing glow or outline). Clear highlight after 5 seconds or on dismiss.

tasks.title: Add loading state with progressive rendering
tasks.description: Show 'Counting trouts...' on initial load. Display stats as soon as /api/stats returns. Render trouts progressively as batches arrive. Hide loading indicator when all data loaded.

tasks.title: Implement error handling and fallbacks
tasks.description: Add error boundaries around PixiJS canvas. Toast notifications for API failures with retry. WebGL not-supported fallback message. Phantom not-installed link. Wallet rejection messages.

tasks.title: Add API rate limiting middleware
tasks.description: Create rate limiting middleware for API routes: /api/verify 5/min/IP, /api/name 3/min/IP, /api/trouts 30/min/IP. Use Upstash ratelimit or custom Redis-based solution.

tasks.title: Configure next.config.js for production
tasks.description: Set up next.config.js with image domains, webpack config for Web Worker loading, any required headers or redirects.

tasks.title: Deploy to Vercel and configure environment variables
tasks.description: Connect repo to Vercel. Set all environment variables. Verify build succeeds. Test cron job fires. Confirm Edge/Serverless runtime assignment is correct.

tasks.title: Provision Neon PostgreSQL database
tasks.description: Create Neon project, run migrations, verify connection from Vercel serverless functions.

tasks.title: Provision Upstash Redis instance
tasks.description: Create Upstash Redis database, configure REST endpoint, verify connection from Vercel Edge functions.

tasks.title: Run initial holder data sync
tasks.description: Trigger the cron sync manually with real token mint address. Verify all 12,400 holders are imported. Check Redis cache is populated correctly.

tasks.title: Create leaderboard page layout
tasks.description: Create src/app/leaderboard/page.tsx. Responsive table layout with rank, name/address, tokens, days, score columns. Navigation back to main visualization.

tasks.title: Implement LeaderboardTable component with pagination
tasks.description: Create src/components/leaderboard/LeaderboardTable.tsx. Paginated (50/page). Search/filter input. Click row to navigate to main page with ?trout= param. SWR data fetching from /api/leaderboard.

tasks.title: Implement canvas screenshot capture
tasks.description: Create src/components/overlay/ScreenshotButton.tsx. Capture current PixiJS canvas to PNG blob via renderer.extract. Add branded watermark (logo + URL).

tasks.title: Implement share to X/Twitter
tasks.description: Add share button that opens Twitter intent URL with pre-filled text and deep link. Include trout name and bigtrout.fish URL.

tasks.title: Implement deep link support (?trout=address)
tasks.description: On page load, check URL for ?trout= query param. If present, fetch that trout's data, animate camera to its position, enter follow mode, show tooltip.

tasks.title: Create or acquire final pixel-art trout sprites
tasks.description: Replace placeholder sprites with polished pixel art. 6 tiers, each with swim animation frames. Output as sprite sheet atlas (PNG + JSON). Ensure easy swap via public/assets/sprites/.
tasks.notes: Can be done in parallel with development. AI-generated or commissioned artist.

tasks.title: Create river background art assets
tasks.description: Design tileable river background textures: deep water, mid water, riverbed. Add rock and plant decoration sprites. Pixel-art style matching trout sprites.

tasks.title: Add animated water effects (bubbles, ripples)
tasks.description: Add particle effects to effectsLayer: floating bubbles, surface ripples, subtle light caustics. Use ParticleContainer for performance.

tasks.title: Create logo and UI icons
tasks.description: Design Big Trout Fish logo, favicon, and UI icons (search, zoom, screenshot, wallet). Place in public/assets/ui/.

tasks.title: Add OG image and social media metadata
tasks.description: Create Open Graph image for link previews. Add proper meta tags in layout.tsx: og:title, og:description, og:image, twitter:card.

tasks.title: Add ambient underwater audio
tasks.description: Add optional ambient river/underwater sound. Muted by default, toggle via UI button. Use Web Audio API or simple HTML5 audio element with loop.

tasks.title: Implement minimap navigation widget
tasks.description: Small overview map in corner showing density heatmap of all trouts. Current viewport indicated by a rectangle. Click minimap to jump to location.

tasks.title: Add SNS (.sol domain) resolution for display names
tasks.description: For holders without custom names, attempt to resolve their Solana Name Service (.sol) domain. Display domain name instead of truncated address.

tasks.title: Build analytics dashboard (holder growth over time)
tasks.description: Track daily holder count snapshots. Create a simple chart page showing holder count over time, new holders per day, average holding duration trends.

tasks.title: Handle sold-out wallets gracefully
tasks.description: When cron detects a holder's balance dropped to 0: fade out the trout over the next sync cycle (ghost sprite at 50% opacity), then remove after 24h. Preserve custom name for 7 days in case they buy back.

tasks.title: Add mobile 'best on desktop' banner
tasks.description: Show a dismissible banner on mobile devices suggesting desktop for the full experience. Save dismissal to localStorage so it only shows once.
